name: Mr Bean - Sandwich Stack
description:
Help Mr Bean catch ingredients shot out by his crazy kitchen machine and build the biggest sandwich you can!

Don’t let the tower wobble too much or it’ll all come tumbling down. Can you stack lettuce, cheese, spaghetti and jelly higher than your friends?

◉ 100% Free to Play
◉ Simple 1 Tap controls
◉ Physics based fun – how high can you stack?
◉ Over 20 silly ingredients – crab, pie and pineapple sandwich anyone?
◉ Decorate Mr Bean’s kitchen with 14 collectable wallpapers
◉ Achievements and Leaderboards – can you beat your friends?
